name: Shattered Station
description:
You are  on a dying space station deep in the asteroid belt after a massive war. The station was once mighty, but its parts and pieces have been scattered around, useless alone, but with the little power the station can provide, it could lead to a formidable defense. Collect the debris and bring them back to the station! But hurry, because an impending asteroid wave  threatens to destroy the station, and you must defend it at all costs!

How to Play:

  • Use W, A, S, D to move
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot lasers
  • Fullscreen is recommended
  • When you first start, the asteroids take a while to come in.
  • You have to find little turrets scattered around and push them towards your station
  • If the turret is in range, it can connect to the station and start shooting asteroids
  • Turrets can be destroyed, but if the station is destroyed, the game is over

Known Issues:

  • When turrets get destroyed, their power tethers remain
  • The health bars get really cluttered really quickly
  • Turrets connected to each other can get disconnected from the station but still stay powered.
  • Highscores may or may not work
